TEXT.English: When checked, a button for opening the BUG Menu is displayed in the upper left corner of the main interface, next to the Event Log button (restart required). The BUG Menu can always be accessed from the Game Menu [ESC], the Player Options screen [CTRL+O] and directly via [CTRL-ALT+O].
TEXT.French: When checked, shows the BUG Option Screen button.
TEXT.German: Zeigt (nach dem nächsten Neustart) eine Schaltfläche zum Öffnen des BUG-Menüs in der oberen linken Ecke des Hauptbildschirms an (neben der Ereignis-Log-Schaltfläche). Das BUG-Menü lässt sich in jedem Fall vom Spielmenü [ESC] und Spieleroptionsmenü [STRG+O] aus aufrufen, und direkt per [CTRL+ALT+O].
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, mostra il bottone della schermata opzioni del BUG.
TEXT.Spanish: Permite mostrar el botón de opciones BUG en la pantalla.

TEXT.English: When checked, the Event Log is opened at the start of a turn if the number of new messages to display exceeds a limit. Major events (e.g. declarations of war) are still announced on the main interface. Regardless of the limit, the Event Log is opened whenever an AI leader contacts the player. This option depends on the "Minimize Popups" option (STRG + O); without Minimize Popups, the Event Log is never opened.
TEXT.French: When checked, the Event Log is opened at the start of a turn if the number of new messages to display exceeds a limit. Major events (e.g. declarations of war) are still announced on the main interface. Regardless of the limit, the Event Log is opened whenever an AI leader contacts the player. This option depends on the "Minimize Popups" option (STRG + O); without Minimize Popups, the Event Log is never opened.
TEXT.German: Öffnet zu Beginn des Zuges das Ereignis-Log, wenn die Anzahl der neuen Nachrichten einen Grenzwert überschreitet. Nur wichtige Ereignisse (z.B. Kriegserklärungen) werden zusätzlich auf dem Hauptbildschirm angezeigt. Unabhängig von der Anzahl der Nachrichten, öffnet sich das Ereignis-Log außerdem bei jeder Kontaktaufnahme durch einen KI-Spieler. Wichtig: Die Option "Popups minimieren" (STRG + O) ist eine Voraussetzung für das automatische Öffnen des Ereignis-Logs.
TEXT.Italian: When checked, the Event Log is opened at the start of a turn if the number of new messages to display exceeds a limit. Major events (e.g. declarations of war) are still announced on the main interface. Regardless of the limit, the Event Log is opened whenever an AI leader contacts the player. This option depends on the "Minimize Popups" option (STRG + O); without Minimize Popups, the Event Log is never opened.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, the Event Log is opened at the start of a turn if the number of new messages to display exceeds a limit. Major events (e.g. declarations of war) are still announced on the main interface. Regardless of the limit, the Event Log is opened whenever an AI leader contacts the player. This option depends on the "Minimize Popups" option (STRG + O); without Minimize Popups, the Event Log is never opened.

TEXT.English: The Event Log is opened when the number of new messages exceeds this limit.
TEXT.French: The Event Log is opened when the number of new messages exceeds this limit.
TEXT.German: Das Ereignis-Log wird automatisch geöffnet, wenn die Anzahl der neuen Nachrichten größer ist als die eingestellte Obergrenze.
TEXT.Italian: The Event Log is opened when the number of new messages exceeds this limit.
TEXT.Spanish: The Event Log is opened when the number of new messages exceeds this limit.

TEXT.English: When checked, a flashing message "Press ENTER to end turn" is shown once all units and cities have been given orders (as in BtS). Otherwise, the "End Turn" button still blinks as it does in BtS, but no message is shown.
TEXT.French: When checked, a flashing message "Press ENTER to end turn" is shown once all units and cities have been given orders (as in BtS). Otherwise, the "End Turn" button still blinks as it does in BtS, but no message is shown.
TEXT.German: Blinkanzeige "Runde beenden mit EINGABETASTE" (wie in BtS), sobald alle Einheiten und Städte Befehle erhalten haben. Die rote Rundenende-Schaltfläche blinkt auch wenn diese Option nicht angekreuzt ist.
TEXT.Italian: When checked, a flashing message "Press ENTER to end turn" is shown once all units and cities have been given orders (as in BtS). Otherwise, the "End Turn" button still blinks as it does in BtS, but no message is shown.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, a flashing message "Press ENTER to end turn" is shown once all units and cities have been given orders (as in BtS). Otherwise, the "End Turn" button still blinks as it does in BtS, but no message is shown.

TEXT.English: Text color to use for a positive per-turn income
TEXT.French: Text color to use for a positive per-turn income
TEXT.Italian: Text color to use for a positive per-turn income
TEXT.Spanish: Text color to use for a positive per-turn income

TEXT.English: Text color to use for a negative per-turn income
TEXT.French: Text color to use for a negative per-turn income
TEXT.Italian: Text color to use for a negative per-turn income
TEXT.Spanish: Text color to use for a negative per-turn income

TEXT.English: Text color to use when a negative per-turn income exceeds the gold reserves in the treasury
TEXT.French: Text color to use for a negative per-turn income
TEXT.German: Textfarbe bei negativem Einkommen, das den Goldvorrat übersteigt.
TEXT.Italian: Text color to use when a negative per-turn income exceeds the gold reserves in the treasury
TEXT.Spanish: Text color to use when a negative per-turn income exceeds the gold reserves in the treasury

TEXT.English: When checked, displays a progress bar at the top of the main interface that shows when the next Great Person (except Great General) will be born and in which city.
TEXT.French: En activant, montre la barre de progrès et la ville du prochain Personnage Illustre.
TEXT.German: Platziert am oberen Rand des Hauptbildschirms einen Fortschrittsbalken, der anzeigt, wann die nächste große Persönlichkeit (außer Generäle) erscheinen wird und in welcher Stadt.
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, mostra il progresso e la città del prossimo Grande Personaggio.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, displays the progress and city of the next Great Person.

TEXT.English: The number of Great Person (GP) types to display in the GP bar. "[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]1[COLOR_REVERT]" shows only the most likely GP type. "[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]All[COLOR_REVERT]" also displays the probability distribution. Regardless of this option, that distribution is shown in the hover text of the GP bar.
TEXT.French: Determine combien de types de PI doivent être montrés dans la Barre de Progrès. L'option [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Maximum[COLOR_REVERT] montre aussi les chances de chacun.
TEXT.German: Die Anzahl der Typen von großen Persönlichkeiten (GP), die im GP-Balken angezeigt werden. "[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]1[COLOR_REVERT]" zeigt lediglich den wahrscheinlichsten GP-Typ. "[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Alle[COLOR_REVERT]" zeigt die gesamte Wahrscheinlichkeitsverteilung. Diese Verteilung wird in jedem Fall im Hilftext des GP-Balkens angezeigt.
TEXT.Italian: Determina quanti tipi di Grandi Personaggi devono essere mostrati nella Barra dei Grandi Personaggi. L'impostazione [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Massimo[COLOR_REVERT] mostra anche la possibilità percentuale di ognuna.
TEXT.Spanish: Determina cuantos tipos de Gran Personaje mostrar en la barra de progreso de Grandes Personas. La opción [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Máximo[COLOR_REVERT] también muestra la probabilidad de cada tipo.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays a progress bar on top of the main interface that shows how much combat experience is needed for the next Great General.
TEXT.French: En activant, montre l'Expérience au Combat nécessaire pour le prochain Général Illustre.
TEXT.German: Platziert am oberen Rand des Hauptbildschirms einen Fortschrittsbalken, der die Gefechtserfahrung anzeigt, die für den nächsten großen General benötigt wird.
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, mostra la barra di avanzamento per il prossimo Grande Generale.
TEXT.Spanish: Muestra una barra de progreso para el próximo Gran General.

TEXT.English: When checked, the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Great Person[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Great General[COLOR_REVERT] bars (if enabled) only appear once there has been any progress toward the birth of a great person.
TEXT.French: When checked, the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Great Person[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Great General[COLOR_REVERT] bars (if enabled) only appear once there has been any progress toward the birth of a great person.
TEXT.German: Die Fortschrittsbalken für [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Große Persönlichkeiten[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Große Generäle[COLOR_REVERT] (falls überhaupt aktiviert) erscheinen erst, wenn entsprechender Fortschritt besteht.
TEXT.Italian: When checked, the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Great Person[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Great General[COLOR_REVERT] bars (if enabled) only appear once there has been any progress toward the birth of a great person.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Great Person[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Great General[COLOR_REVERT] bars (if enabled) only appear once there has been any progress toward the birth of a great person.

TEXT.English: When checked, a second pair of +/- buttons is displayed on the main interface for each type of commerce. These extra buttons set the respective commerce rate to 100% (+) or 0% (-). Regardless of this option, a right-click on the normal +/- buttons also sets the rate to 100%/0%.
TEXT.French: When checked, displays a second pair of +/- buttons for each commerce type that set the rate to 100% and 0% respectively.
TEXT.German: Zeigt ein zweites Paar "+/-"-Schaltflächen für jeden Anteilsregler an, die den Anteil auf 100% beziehungsweise 0% setzen. Auch ohne diese Option lassen sich die Anteile durch einen Rechtsklick auf die gewöhnlichen "+/-"-Schaltflächen auf 100%/0% setzen.
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, mostra una seconda coppia di bottoni +/- per ogni tipo di commercio che impostano il valore rispettivamente al 100% ed allo 0%.
TEXT.Spanish: Muestra un segundo par de botones +/- buttons que permiten fijar la producción a 100% y 0% respectivamente.

TEXT.Italian: Nascondi barra di spionaggio quando è 0
TEXT.Spanish: Ocultar el control de espionaje cuando está en 0

TEXT.English: Remove the espionage slider from the main interface if the slider position is 0. The slider can then still be accessed through the Espionage screen or the City screen.
TEXT.French: Retirez la réglette d'espionnage de l'écran principal si la position de la réglette est 0. Vous pouvez toujours y accéder via l'écran Espionnage ou l'écran Ville.
TEXT.German: Entfernt den Spionageregler vom Hauptbildschirm, wenn er auf 0 steht. Der Regler ist dann immer noch auf dem Spionagebildschirm und dem Stadtbildschirm verfügbar.
TEXT.Italian: Rimuovere la barra di spionaggio dalla schermata principale se la sua posizione è 0. La barra può essere raggiunta attraverso la schermata Espionaggio o la schermata Città.
TEXT.Spanish: Retire el control deslizante de espionaje de la pantalla principal si la posición del control deslizante es 0. Se puede acceder al control deslizante a través de la pantalla Espionaje o de la pantalla Ciudad.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays arrows to cycle through cities above your civ's flag.
TEXT.French: En activant, montre des flèches pour cycler vos villes au-dessous du drapeau de votre civilisation.
TEXT.German: Zeigt Pfeile über der Flagge der eigenen Zivilisation an, mit denen durch die einzelnen Städte geschaltet werden kann
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, mostra sopra alla vostra bandiera le frecce per scorrere fra le Città.
TEXT.Spanish: Muestra flechas encima de tu bandera que permiten ciclar entre distintas ciudades.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays a slider for adjusting the field of view. The field-of-view setting changes the camera distance, but, unlike zoom, without changing the camera angle.
TEXT.French: When checked, displays a slide bar which can be used to change the field of view.
TEXT.German: Zeigt im Hauptbildschirm einen Regler an, mit dem die Größe des Sichtfelds eingestellt werden kann. Im Gegensatz zur Zoomfunktion ändert sich dabei der Blickwinkel nicht.
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, visualizza un cursore che può essere utilizzato per regolare il campo visuale.
TEXT.Spanish: Muestra una barra deslizante que permite modificar el campo de visión.

TEXT.English: The camera distance at the start of a new game and after loading a savegame. Also affects the volume of music and sound effects.[NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Automatic[COLOR_REVERT] - Set the default distance based on the Field-of-View value. The greater the field of view, the smaller the default distance.[NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Close[COLOR_REVERT] - 2200 meters; as in the original game.[NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Medium[COLOR_REVERT] - 4100 meters[NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Far[COLOR_REVERT] - 6000 meters; close to the Globe view boundary.[NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Custom[COLOR_REVERT] - Use the 'CAMERA_START_DISTANCE' value set in XML (GlobalDefines_advc.xml)
TEXT.French: The camera distance at the start of a new game and after loading a savegame. Also affects the volume of music and sound effects.[NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Automatic[COLOR_REVERT] - Set the default distance based on the Field-of-View value. The greater the field of view, the smaller the default distance.[NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Close[COLOR_REVERT] - 2200 meters; as in the original game.[NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Medium[COLOR_REVERT] - 4100 meters[NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Far[COLOR_REVERT] - 6000 meters; close to the Globe view boundary.[NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Custom[COLOR_REVERT] - Use the 'CAMERA_START_DISTANCE' value set in XML (GlobalDefines_advc.xml)
TEXT.German: Der Kameraabstand nach dem Erstellen oder Laden eines Spiels. Wirkt sich auch auf die Lautstärke von Musik und Effekten aus.[NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Auto[COLOR_REVERT] - Entsprechend dem Sichtfeld-Wert. Je größer das Sichtfeld, desto kleiner der Standardabstand.[NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Nah[COLOR_REVERT] - 2200m; wie im Originalspiel.[NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Mittel[COLOR_REVERT] - 4100m[NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Weit[COLOR_REVERT] - 6000m; nahe am Übergang zur Weltansicht.[NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]XML-Wert[COLOR_REVERT] - Verwendet den 'CAMERA_START_DISTANCE'-Wert in GlobalDefines_advc.xml.
TEXT.Italian: The camera distance at the start of a new game and after loading a savegame. Also affects the volume of music and sound effects.[NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Automatic[COLOR_REVERT] - Set the default distance based on the Field-of-View value. The greater the field of view, the smaller the default distance.[NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Close[COLOR_REVERT] - 2200 meters; as in the original game.[NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Medium[COLOR_REVERT] - 4100 meters[NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Far[COLOR_REVERT] - 6000 meters; close to the Globe view boundary.[NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Custom[COLOR_REVERT] - Use the 'CAMERA_START_DISTANCE' value set in XML (GlobalDefines_advc.xml)
TEXT.Spanish: The camera distance at the start of a new game and after loading a savegame. Also affects the volume of music and sound effects.[NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Automatic[COLOR_REVERT] - Set the default distance based on the Field-of-View value. The greater the field of view, the smaller the default distance.[NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Close[COLOR_REVERT] - 2200 meters; as in the original game.[NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Medium[COLOR_REVERT] - 4100 meters[NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Far[COLOR_REVERT] - 6000 meters; close to the Globe view boundary.[NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Custom[COLOR_REVERT] - Use the 'CAMERA_START_DISTANCE' value set in XML (GlobalDefines_advc.xml).

TEXT.English: When checked, progress bars on the main interface and city screen show tick marks that project the current per-turn progress rate into the future.
TEXT.French: When checked, displays tick marks on selected progress bars that illustrate estimated future turn progress.
TEXT.German: Zeigt Teilstriche auf den Fortschrittsbalken im Haupt- und Stadtbildschirm an, die die voraussichtlichen Fortschritte in zukünftigen Runden markieren.
TEXT.Italian: Visualizza sulle barre di avanzamento selezionate dei trattini che mostrano il progresso stimato per i turni successivi.
TEXT.Spanish: Muestra líneas en las barras de progreso seleccionadas que muestran el progreso estimado en turnos futuros.

TEXT.English: When checked, the Field of View value is remembered from game to game.
TEXT.French: When checked, the Field of View value is remembered from game to game.
TEXT.German: Merkt sich die letzte gewählte Einstellung für das Sichtfeld (engl. "Field of View") für weitere Partien
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, il valore assegnato al Campo visuale viene conservato.
TEXT.Spanish: Si se activa, el valor de Campo de Visión es recordado entre distintas partidas.

TEXT.English: Stores the Field of View value
TEXT.French: Stores the Field of View value
TEXT.German: Eingabemöglichkeit für die Einstellung des Sichtfeldes (engl. "Field of View")
TEXT.Italian: Riporta il valore assegnato al Campo visuale
TEXT.Spanish: Almacena el valor de Campo de Visión.

TEXT.English: When a single unit is selected, this option shows the remaining movement points as a fraction on the Info pane.
TEXT.French: When checked, shows the Movement Points for a single unit as a fraction in the Info Pane.
TEXT.German: Zeigt die verbleibenden Bewegungspunkte in der Detailanzeige mit Nachkommastellen an, wenn eine einzelne Einheit ausgewählt ist.
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, mostra nel Pannello delle Informazioni i Punti Movimento di una Unità come un numero con una cifra decimale.
TEXT.Spanish: Muestra los puntos de movimiento para unidades como una fracción en el panel de información.

TEXT.English: When multiple units are selected, this option shows the minimum and maximum of the selected units' movement points on the Info pane.
TEXT.French: When checked, shows the minimum and maximum Movement Points for all selected units in the Info Pane.
TEXT.German: Zeigt das Minimum und Maximum der Bewegungspunkte der ausgewählten Einheiten in der Detailanzeige an, wenn mehrere Einheiten ausgewählt sind.
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, mostra nel Pannello delle Informazioni il valore minimo e quello massimo per i Punti Movimento del gruppo di Unità selezionate.
TEXT.Spanish: Si se activa, muestra en el panel de información los puntos de movimiento mínimos y máximos para todas las unidades seleccionadas.

TEXT.English: When checked, shows all promotions possessed by at least one unit in the selected stack on the Info pane.
TEXT.French: When checked, shows the promotions possessed by at least one unit in the stack.
TEXT.German: Zeigt in der Detailanzeige alle Beförderungen an, über die zumindest eine Einheit des ausgewählten Verbandes verfügt.
TEXT.Italian: When checked, shows the promotions possessed by at least one unit in the stack.
TEXT.Spanish: Si se activa, muestra los ascensos poseídos por al menos una de las unidades del grupo.

TEXT.English: When checked, the stack promotion icons on the Info pane show the number of units in the selected stack that possess each promotion (if that number is greater than one).
TEXT.French: When checked, shows the number of units in a stack that possess each promotion if more than one.
TEXT.German: Zeigt in der Detailanzeige für jede Beförderung an, wie viele Einheiten im ausgewählten Verband über diese Beförderung verfügen (wenn mehrere Einheiten über die Beförderung verfügen).
TEXT.Italian: When checked, shows the number of units in a stack that possess each promotion if more than one.
TEXT.Spanish: Muestra el número de unidades del grupo que poseen una determinada promoción, en el caso de que haya más de una.

TEXT.English: Text color of the promotion count (unless a promotion is possessed by all units)
TEXT.French: Text color of the promotion count (unless a promotion is possessed by all units)
TEXT.German: Farbe, in der die Anzahl der Einheiten mit einer bestimmten Beförderung angezeigt wird (außer wenn alle Einheiten über diese Beförderung verfügen)
TEXT.Italian: Text color of the promotion count (unless a promotion is possessed by all units)
TEXT.Spanish: Text color of the promotion count (unless a promotion is possessed by all units)

TEXT.English: If all units in a stack possess a given promotion, use this color instead of the one above.
TEXT.French: If all units in a stack possess a given promotion, use this color instead of the one above.
TEXT.German: Diese Farbe wird anstatt der obigen verwendet, wenn eine Beförderung allen Einheiten des Verbandes gemeinsam ist.
TEXT.Italian: If all units in a stack possess a given promotion, use this color instead of the one above.
TEXT.Spanish: If all units in a stack possess a given promotion, use this color instead of the one above.

TEXT.English: When checked, help text lists the units in a tile grouped by owner and shows the total unit count per owner.
TEXT.French: En activant, le texte d'aide énumère les unités d'une case groupées par propriétaire et affiche le nombre total d'unités par propriétaire.
TEXT.German: Im Hilfetext werden Einheiten eines Feldes nach Besitzer gruppiert aufgeführt und die Einheitenzahl pro Besitzer wird angegeben.
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, il testo di aiuto elenca le unità in una casella raggruppate per proprietario e mostra il conteggio totale delle unità per proprietario.
TEXT.Spanish: Si se activa, el texto de ayuda lista las unidades en una casilla agrupadas por propietario y muestra el número total de unidades por propietario.

TEXT.English: Determines the size of the build and action buttons in the bottom center of the screen.
TEXT.French: Determines the size of the build and action buttons in the bottom center of the screen.
TEXT.German: Bestimmt die Größe der Bau- und Befehlssymbole im Menü am unteren Bildschirmrand
TEXT.Italian: Determina la dimensione delle icone per i tasti di costruzione e azione nella parte bassa e centrale dello schermo.
TEXT.Spanish: Determina el tamaño de los iconos de construir y acción en los botones de la parte inferior central de la pantalla.

TEXT.English: When checked, automatic unit selection happens instantly rather than with a delay.
TEXT.French: When checked, automatic unit selection happens instantly rather than with a delay.
TEXT.German: Lässt den automatischen Einheitenwechsel ohne Verzögerung passieren.
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, la selezione automatica tra le unità è istantanea anzichè con ritardo.
TEXT.Spanish: Activada, la selección de unidades automática ocurre instantáneamente más que con un retardo.

TEXT.English: When checked, selecting units with the [Shift] key will only ever add a single unit at a time.
TEXT.French: When checked, selecting units with the [Shift] key will only ever add a single unit at a time.
TEXT.German: Beim Auswählen von Einheiten mit gedrückter [Umschalt]-Taste wird mit jedem Klick nur eine Einheit zur Auswahl hinzugefügt.
TEXT.Italian: When checked, selecting units with the [Shift] key will only ever add a single unit at a time.
TEXT.Spanish: Activada, seleccionando unidades con la tecla [Mayús] sólo añadir una unidad cada vez.

TEXT.English: Enables the "Sea Patrol" mission. When unchecked, the mission button is removed and the AI won't use the mission either.
TEXT.French: Enables the "Sea Patrol" mission. When unchecked, the mission button is removed and the AI won't use the mission either.
TEXT.Italian: Enables the "Sea Patrol" mission. When unchecked, the mission button is removed and the AI won't use the mission either.
TEXT.Spanish: Enables the "Sea Patrol" mission. When unchecked, the mission button is removed and the AI won't use the mission either.

TEXT.English: When checked, the scoreboard remains visible in Globe View so long as no layer options need to be displayed. (E.g. the Strategy layer has options for drawing lines, leaving no room for the scoreboard.) If not checked, the scoreboard is never visible in Globe View (like in BtS).
TEXT.French: When checked, the scoreboard remains visible in Globe View so long as no layer options need to be displayed. (E.g. the Strategy layer has options for drawing lines, leaving no room for the scoreboard.) If not checked, the scoreboard is never visible in Globe View (like in BtS).
TEXT.German: Zeigt in der Globalansicht die Punktestände der Spieler an, sofern der Platz nicht für Optionen benötigt wird. (Die Strategieansicht z.B. hat Optionen zum Einzeichnen von Linien.)
TEXT.Italian: When checked, the scoreboard remains visible in Globe View so long as no layer options need to be displayed. (E.g. the Strategy layer has options for drawing lines, leaving no room for the scoreboard.) If not checked, the scoreboard is never visible in Globe View (like in BtS).
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, the scoreboard remains visible in Globe View so long as no layer options need to be displayed. (E.g. the Strategy layer has options for drawing lines, leaving no room for the scoreboard.) If not checked, the scoreboard is never visible in Globe View (like in BtS).

TEXT.English: Shows filter options "Food", "Luxuries" and "General" when the Resource Display is enabled in Globe View. When unchecked, the Resource Display always highlights all resources and no options are shown, leaving space for the scoreboard.
TEXT.French: Shows filter options "Food", "Luxuries" and "General" when the Resource Display is enabled in Globe View. When unchecked, the Resource Display always highlights all resources and no options are shown, leaving space for the scoreboard.
TEXT.German: Zeigt Filter-Optionen "Nahrung", "Luxusgüter" und "Allgemein" an, wenn die Ressourcenanzeige und die Globalansicht aktiviert sind. Ansonsten werden die Ressourcen stets ungefiltert angezeigt, und an Stelle der Filter-Optionen ist Platz für die Punkteanzeige.
TEXT.Italian: Shows filter options "Food", "Luxuries" and "General" when the Resource Display is enabled in Globe View. When unchecked, the Resource Display always highlights all resources and no options are shown, leaving space for the scoreboard.
TEXT.Spanish: Shows filter options "Food", "Luxuries" and "General" when the Resource Display is enabled in Globe View. When unchecked, the Resource Display always highlights all resources and no options are shown, leaving space for the scoreboard.

TEXT.English: When checked, the Resource Display highlights Tribal Villages in addition to resources. However, Tribal Villages are never highlighted by the Resource Display if [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Unit Action Recommendations[COLOR_REVERT] (Ctrl + O) are enabled. (Because that setting also highlights Tribal Villages.)
TEXT.French: When checked, the Resource Display highlights Tribal Villages in addition to resources. However, Tribal Villages are never highlighted by the Resource Display if [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Unit Action Recommendations[COLOR_REVERT] (Ctrl + O) are enabled. (Because that setting also highlights Tribal Villages.)
TEXT.German: Markiert zusätzlich zu Ressourcen auch Stammesdörfer, wenn die Ressourcenanzeige aktiv ist. Ausnahme: Die Ressourcenanzeige markiert keine Stammesdörfer, wenn [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Einheitenempfehlungen[COLOR_REVERT] (Strg + O) eingeschaltet ist, da diese Option ebenfalls Stammesdörfer hervorhebt.
TEXT.Italian: When checked, the Resource Display highlights Tribal Villages in addition to resources. However, Tribal Villages are never highlighted by the Resource Display if [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Unit Action Recommendations[COLOR_REVERT] (Ctrl + O) are enabled. (Because that setting also highlights Tribal Villages.)
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, the Resource Display highlights Tribal Villages in addition to resources. However, Tribal Villages are never highlighted by the Resource Display if [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Unit Action Recommendations[COLOR_REVERT] (Ctrl + O) are enabled. (Because that setting also highlights Tribal Villages.)

TEXT.English: When checked, yield icons are shown on the map whenever a Settler unit is selected (like in BtS). Otherwise, yield icons are only shown when the Yield Display (above the mini map) is enabled.[NEWLINE]This option should not be toggled while a Settler unit is selected.

TEXT.French: Symboles de ressources au début du jeu
TEXT.Spanish: Muestra recursos al inicio del juego

TEXT.English: When checked, the Resource Display is enabled at the start of every new game. Otherwise, the Resource Display is disabled at game start.
TEXT.French: Active l'affichage des ressources au début du jeu.
TEXT.Italian: Abilita la segnalazione delle risorse all'inizio del gioco.
TEXT.Spanish: Activa las marcas de recursos al inicio del juego.

TEXT.English: When checked, the [ICON_TRADE] icon is shown above the billboard of cities that are connected to your capital (as in BtS). Note that you can always consult the Trade layer (Globe view) for information about trade connections.
TEXT.French: When checked, the [ICON_TRADE] icon is shown above the billboard of cities that are connected to your capital (as in BtS). Note that you can always consult the Trade layer (Globe view) for information about trade connections.
TEXT.German: Zeigt das [ICON_TRADE]-Symbol über den Namen von Städten an, die an Ihr Städtenetz angeschlossen sind (wie in BtS). In jedem Fall können Sie über die Handelsgruppenanzeige (Globalansicht) prüfen, ob eine Stadt angeschlossen ist.

TEXT.English: When checked, the [ICON_AIRPORT] icon is shown above the billboard of cities that have an airport.
